title: Loss of control in 7.3
body:
Ever since 7.3 dropped, all my games have had a problem like this: issue a command (move, skill, item or summoner spell) and my champ ignores it for a few seconds. 
Everything else in the game is moving (and killing me) as it should but I have no control and can't react in anyway regardless of what I click or press. 
It seems like packet loss but I checked and at least speedtest and haste are telling me that I haven't dropped any.
Currently very frustrating to play because of the random timings and the frequency of these happenings.

replies.body:
These symptoms are definitely common under circumstances where *Packet loss* is occurring. Keep in mind that your tests to one server or website are not indicative that your connection to all servers is fine, since each service you access hosts servers in different geolocations. I strongly recommend ensuring your local network settings are compatible with our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) before we move forward with troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
